description.brief: Tests roscpp templated serialization and message generation

package.description: Set of tests to test templated serialization, message generation, and using messages with custom allocators
package.author: Josh Faust

rosbuild2.msgs: msg/ArrayOfFixedLength.msg msg/ArrayOfVariableLength.msg msg/Constants.msg msg/CustomHeader.msg msg/EmbeddedExternal.msg msg/EmbeddedFixedLength.msg msg/EmbeddedVariableLength.msg msg/FixedLengthArrayOfExternal.msg msg/FixedLength.msg msg/FixedLengthStringArray.msg msg/HeaderNotFirstMember.msg msg/VariableLengthArrayOfExternal.msg msg/VariableLength.msg msg/VariableLengthStringArray.msg msg/WithDuration.msg msg/WithHeader.msg msg/WithMemberNamedHeaderThatIsNotAHeader.msg msg/WithTime.msg
